thread.title: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS
thread.title_full: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS

title: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS
text:
> Top News Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS Fans observe during the national anthem before Game 3 in baseball's National League Division Series between the Chicago Cubs and the St. Louis Cardinals, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Charles Rex Arbogast) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
